Very cute! The sleeves arent quite to my elbows as in the models picture. But close enough. I havent washed it yet so I am hoping it doesnt shrink. Its cute and flowy. Very thin fabric. More of a spring/summer shirt than fall/winter for sure. But I will be wearing it during the fall anyway! I got an XL even though L was recommended. I am glad I did. I think the L would have been too small if it shrinks after being washed. I am short and chubby so I always go with XL. I would recommend ordering the size you normally wear, not necessarily the recommended size if you want more flowy and less form fitting. I prefer more flowy as form fitting for me is just not as comfortable. This is not a stretchy material either. Its adorable and I look forward to wearing it to work and out and about!
